extendedInfo.description: Big Fish is pleased to announce that Fairway Solitaireâ¢ is back, and it's bigger and better than ever! One of the most exciting and addictive card games available includes solitaire hands dealt on more than 408 hand-crafted golf holes, 4 mini games, 37 trophies, a golf shop, golf announcers, hazard cards, and one SERIOUSLY ticked off gopher! "â¦ an incredibly awesome puzzle game masquerading as solitaire." - Penny Arcade"It might look like a straightforward card game on the surface but there's much more to Fairway Solitaire thanks to its assured, inventive design. It's a hugely enjoyable, supremely polished strategic deck shuffler that should suit puzzle fans to a tee." PocketGamer: 8/10Follow this hilariously sarcastic story of the gopher and his seething disdain and desire to put all golfers in their place! From beachside courses where palm trees sway, to the hustle and bustle of illuminated city courses, keep your eye on the prize because there is nowhere this gopher wonât follow. Score the best runs by clearing the card deck using the least amount of moves, and donât forget about those mulligans! Whether scoring a double bogey or 3 under par, this hit will have you laughing so loud youâll forget to be quiet on the golf course! TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME! âââââ Features âââââ â Bright scenery and captivating artwork bring the classic to life!â Delightful commentary and appealing sounds enhance game playâ Fill up your golf meter to earn helpful golf bucksâ Find Iron cards on the green to add to your golf bagâ Watch out for water, wedge, and rough cards that test your skills!â Use your golf bucks for one iron, or fill your entire bag!â Wild Shot cards can either make or break a terrific golf game! âââ Discover more from Big Fish Games! âââ Big Fish is the leading global marketplace to discover and enjoy casual games. You can enjoy our virtually endless selection of games anytime, anywhere â on your PC, Mac, mobile phone, or tablet. Learn more at bigfishgames.com!We have many other great Google Play games available.  Just type in 'Big Fish Games' for more fun and adventure! Follow us on Twitter: http://bigfi.sh/BigFishTwitterBecome a fan on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/BigFishGamesMobile

reviews.title: Love this game!
reviews.comment: Used to play this on the computer so thrilled there\'s finally an app! Great job . . . The graphics are beautiful.  This game is awesome!
reviews.author: Pille Cabins

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: It is the best game. Lots of fun and really great graphics
reviews.author: Ashley Axson

reviews.title: I LOVE THIS GAME
reviews.comment: I Love this game & It works great on my phone Gal.s 4 no problems at all so far!!!  But I did not exspect any I mean it is a BIG FISH GAME I LOVE BIG FISH GAMES!!!.     Tammy
reviews.author: Tammy Clark

reviews.title: Now we have to pay
reviews.comment: Went through first level 3 stars every round now I can\'t move farther unless I pay that\'s ridiculous guess I\'ll uninstall
reviews.author: Kim Tanis

reviews.title: Coolest game ever
reviews.comment: I like this game and I am eleven and my parents like it and they are in there thirtys. Just try the game you will like it and if you don\'t there is always the option to uninstall
reviews.author: Logan Winny

reviews.title: Great game, but..
reviews.comment: Game play is really fun and addictive, but on my HTC One, the game locks my phone and I have to do a hard boot to restart the phone.
reviews.author: Shane Hagen

reviews.title: Almost great
reviews.comment: Would be a 5 star, but doesn\'t have the daily bonus puzzles like the ipod version.
reviews.author: Justin Wilson

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Excellent gameplay...no issues so far..worth it to try ..watch out for that gopher !!
reviews.author: Melody Ochoa

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: What a great twist to golf. Lots of fun and a addictive game. Cant stop playing. If u love solitaire u have to have this game                         .
reviews.author: Barry Ellis

reviews.title: Excellent and addicting
reviews.comment: Great game. Levels aee challenging to get all stars. Makes for some replayability
reviews.author: Geoff Bean

reviews.title: Love this game!
reviews.comment: I play it for hours! The storyline is cute and the graphics are amazing. Definitely NOT your grandma\'s old boring solitare!
reviews.author: Toni Miller

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Very entertaining and great animations. Worth the price, recommended.
reviews.author: Adilson Valente

reviews.title: Good but. . .
reviews.comment: Paid to unlock the full app, but despite payment I still get adverts when I launch and I am being pushed to make iap\'s
reviews.author: Gareth Wright

reviews.title: Game like solitaire
reviews.comment: works better as an Apple product. Many more games and trophies to win. If you can put it on an iPod or iPad I\'d recommend that over paying for this one. love the game just not this app for Android
reviews.author: Jacqui Labott

reviews.comment: I own this on my iPad too. Just goes to show how much I enjoy it!

reviews.title: Addictive and unique!
reviews.comment: Watch out Candy Crush there is a new Gopher in town.

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.comment: This is A great game I told all my friends would recommend this.
